bar(icon=None, title=None, width=100, '%', height=40, 'px', options=None, profile=False)¶

Usage:

nav = rptObj.ui.navigation.bar(title="test")
nav.add_text("Test text")
nav + rptObj.ui.button("Click")

footer(components=None, width=100, '%', height='120', 'px', profile=False)¶

Will create a footer object in the body of the report

Underlying HTML Objects:

  • epyk.core.html.HtmlMenu.HtmlFooter

Parameters

  • components – list of html components

  • width – the width of the object

  • height – the height of the object

  • profile – get profiling info

points(count, selected=0, width=100, '%', height=None, 'px', options=None, profile=False)¶

Usage:

p = rptObj.ui.navigation.points(10)
for i, _ in enumerate(p):
  p.click_item(i, [])
